title: Near Protocol
description: Request and response for retrieving nearby geographic locations.

requestType.description: The TIP object type; should be 'near'.

latitude.description: The latitude of the center point for searching nearby places.

longitude.description: The longitude of the center point for searching nearby places.

radius.description: The radius (in kilometers) within which to search for nearby places.

response.description: The maximum response time for the request.

places.description: A list of nearby places found within the specified radius.

distance.description: The distance from the center point to this place in kilometers.
